action.action-desc: Mr. Lamborn (for himself, Mr. Polis, and Mr. Tipton) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To update the map of, and modify the maximum acreage available for inclusion in, the Florissant Fossil Beds National Monument.

section.header: Map update; maximum acreage available for inclusion in the Florissant Fossil Beds National Monument
section.text: The first section of Public Law 91–60 (83 Stat. 101) is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking entitled Proposed Florissant Fossil Beds National Monument, numbered NM–FFB–7100, and dated March 1967, and more particularly described by metes and bounds in an attachment to that map, and inserting entitled Florissant Fossil Beds National Monument Proposed Boundary Adjustment, numbered 171/132,544, and dated May 3, 2016,; and
by striking six thousand acres and inserting 6,300 acres.
